name: Nixo
one_liner: The modern Zendesk for scaling high-touch customer support

name: Cactus
long_description:
Open-source inference engine for deploying AI locally on smartphones. Available in React-Native, Flutter, and C/C++. Supports multimodal models, text-to-speech, embedding models and more.

Repo: https://github.com/cactus-compute/cactus
Discord: https://discord.gg/nPGWGxXSwr
one_liner: Deploy AI models locally on smartphones.

name: Synthetic Society
one_liner: Synthetic Agents to Simulate Real Users

name: Closera
long_description:
We're building AI employees for commercial real estate (CRE) brokerages that are better than today's best analysts.

We're starting by automating the workflows done by human brokers while marketing commercial properties (creating listings, staging properties, drafting offering memorandums, and more). We save them time and enable them to personalize materials, so they can do more deals, improve conversion rates, and make more money.

We see this as our wedge into the market as we work towards our vision of building a full-stack AI system that handles all the repetitive and time-consuming parts of a CRE broker‚Äôs job (and eventually in other industries as well). 

We envision a future where people in the industry are free from making decks and doing grunt work, so they can focus on the parts of the job they love (or just have more free time for pickleball üèì)!

Curious? Check us out at closera.com
one_liner: AI employees for commercial real estate

name: Acrely
long_description:
We provide residential real estate agents voice AI to maximize lead capture and outbound.

Meet Jane, your AI-powered assistant. When someone calls your number and you don't pick up, Jane does. She talks to your leads, figures out what they need, and helps them ‚Äî whether it's scheduling a showing, recommending listings, or just making sure serious buyers get a fast response.

Real estate is one of the last few archaic industries that still uses phone calls as the crux of communication, and voice AI is just getting good enough to make humans willing to engage.

Real estate is a industry of connections, without a clear break-in strategy, or without industry connections, attempting to pitch to a realtor is like finding a needle in a haystack, as they are already flooded with sales calls.

Realtors plaster their phone numbers all over the internet, as well as all over the world and are flooded with unqualified leads, drowning out possible five-figure clients. By saving realtors qualified leads and providing the feeling of a human interaction, realtors save tens of thousands in missed opportunities.
one_liner: voice ai for realtors that answers, so you can close

name: Halluminate
long_description:
We help foundation model labs and enterprises train computer use AI agents with data and sandboxes.

A knowledge worker spends 90% of their day on a computer. A productive AI agent must similarly learn how to use our computers, browsers, and software to deliver real world value. 

Today, browser and computer use AI is inaccurate, slow, and expensive. Model labs and enterprises who want to improve these agents are bottlenecked by two resources: 

1) High quality datasets for benchmarking and evaluations
2) Realistic sandbox environments for safe and accurate testing/training (ex. a simulated version of Salesforce) 

Halluminate offers a suite of products and services to address both these issues. 

Our evaluation service combines proprietary datasets with high quality annotations to help our customers identify and prioritize the biggest failure modes of their computer- and browser- use AI. 

Our platform provides a catalog of fully managed sandboxes, empowering our customers to safely and accurately test/train at scale, resulting in improved performance. 

Our customers see
- Improved browser- and computer-use agent performance
- New and emergent frontier agent capabilities
- Data driven prioritization leading to exponentially faster development speed
- Increased revenue/sales via marketing from public benchmarks

Our paying customers already include leading computer use model labs and the two largest browser agent companies in the space. 

Wyatt and Jerry are friends that met their first week of school studying CS at Cornell University. They‚Äôve been working and studying together for 7+ years.
one_liner: Data and environments to train computer use AI

name: TraceRoot.AI
long_description: TraceRoot.AI is your agentic system for debugging production issues. It has access to logs, traces, source code, commit histories, PRs, issues, Notion, Slack, and more, helping you quickly investigate and resolve issues in complex systems. It visualizes a unified, structured view of your observability data and helps teams debug production issues in complex systems in no time.
one_liner: AI agents automatically fix your production bugs

name: AgentMail
long_description: AgentMail is an email API that gives your agent its own inbox. Think of it like Gmail, but for AI Agents instead of humans.
one_liner: Email Infrastructure for AI Agents

name: Lanesurf
long_description: We help freight brokers book shipments with vetted carriers at the best price, by negotiating rates across multiple calls in parallel.
one_liner: Voice AI for booking freight

name: Async
long_description:
Async is a platform to manage a team of coding agents from anywhere.
It lets you issue tasks, then handles coding and testing in the background. Review results on mobile or desktop, preview changes in-app, run tasks in parallel, and move faster than ever before.

Our mission is to do the work that you don't want to: bug fixes, UI tweaks, papercuts, and KTLO.
Do what's important - delegate the rest to Async.
one_liner: A team of coding agents in your pocket

name: Golpo
long_description: The world's best AI video generator that turns your documents and/or prompts into whiteboard explainer videos. In addition, we have a similar product that generates podcast-style audio explainers from your documents/prompts. API access available for both video and conversational audio. Product of Red Tree Inc.
one_liner: Most Powerful AI Video Gen Model for Explainer Videos From Documents

name: Pond
long_description: We‚Äôre building an AI-native messaging app. Pond is a desktop app you can use with your existing messaging services like iMessage (and soon WhatsApp + more). You can see important messages you haven‚Äôt replied to, snooze conversations, answer customers in your voice, and more.
one_liner: Superhuman for text messages

name: Symbia
long_description: We help biotech, pharma, and CROs plan required regulatory studies and generate clinical trial applications‚Äîfast-tracking approval and saving hundreds of hours.
one_liner: We automate clinical trial applications

name: Sentinel
long_description: Sentinel is your 24/7 on-call engineer which investigates, diagnoses and suggests resolutions for production issues. Sentinel helps teams reduce alert fatigue and downtime, saving engineers from firefighting so they can focus on building.
one_liner: AI on-call engineer

name: Monarcha
long_description: Monarcha is an AI-powered geospatial platform that turns natural language into spatial analysis, styling, and workflows with no GIS expertise required. It connects to your data, understands context, and can runs 50+ spatial tools instantly on the map.
one_liner: The AI GIS Platform

name: Orange Slice
long_description:
Orange Slice uses AI agents to crawl the internet for signals/firmographic data that help sales teams find high-intent prospects by continuously monitoring the internet for buying signals and firmographic changes.

Our agents scan millions of data sources - including company websites, news articles, job postings, press releases, and social media - to detect meaningful events such as leadership changes, product launches, funding rounds, hiring trends, and more. These insights are transformed into actionable sales signals that indicate a company‚Äôs likelihood to purchase your product.

With Orange Slice, revenue teams can prioritize outreach, personalize messaging, and dramatically improve conversion rates by engaging the right accounts at the right time - based on what‚Äôs actually happening, not just static firmographics.
one_liner: AI agents that find you customers who already want to buy

name: Herdora
long_description: We built Herdora for every team that can't afford a GPU optimization expert. Herdora takes your janky PyTorch, writes optimized kernels for it in seconds, and keeps them tuned in production. It monitors your inference workloads, catches inefficiencies, and fixes them automatically. You keep shipping fast. Herdora makes it run fast. No CUDA knowledge required.
one_liner: Cursor for CUDA

name: Cyberdesk
long_description:
Cyberdesk is the computer use agent for Windows apps. Top YC startups in healthcare, finance, and more are using our agent to automate data entry and extraction from EHRs, ERPs, and other legacy Windows software. 

Under the hood, our intelligent caching system makes automations run deterministically when in the happy path, and with 95% cheaper cost and ~5x speed improvement over computer use. But our system still falls back to computer use in anomalies / edge cases, for extra reliability and safety.

We‚Äôd love to talk with you!
https://cal.com/mahmoud-al-madi-klrs5s/30min
one_liner: The computer use agent for automating Windows apps

name: Janet AI
long_description:
Big companies are drowning in Jira tickets. They get hundreds if not thousands of reported issues monthly‚Äîmost never read by anyone who understands the whole system. De-duping is a chore. Related issues get filed twenty times under different teams. The result: teams spend hundreds of hours just figuring out what the most important items are, before they can even start fixing them.

Janet AI is the AI-native ticket triage and management layer for Jira.

Janet AI watches every incoming ticket and immediately compares it to everything that‚Äôs come before. It builds a knowledge graph: which tickets look like the same underlying bug, which roll up into the same component failure, which issues share the same root cause. With this, it surfaces duplicate or related issues, auto-detects fixes mentioned in these related tickets, and identifies those that matter most.

Because the data‚Äôs structured, useful questions become instantly answerable using the Janet AI Chat Agent's contextual intelligence. ‚ÄúAre we already tracking issues related to X?‚Äù ‚ÄúHow should I fix issue PROJ-123?‚Äù ‚ÄúWhat are the most critical issues related to PROJ-456 and how should I prioritize these?‚Äù

Several multi‚Äëbillion‚Äëdollar enterprises are already in talks with Janet AI to reduce the manual work involved in managing tickets at scale.

Interested? Check out our tryjanet.ai to watch our demo, book a call, and get started with a free Proof of Concept on your Jira tickets!
one_liner: The AI-Native Ticket Triage and Management Layer for Jira

name: Imprezia
long_description: The first advertising infrastructure designed specifically for AI apps. Seamlessly integrate contextual brands & products that enhance user experience while generating revenue to pay the inference bills.
one_liner: The World's First AI-Native Ad Network.

name: Alter AI
one_liner: Secure access control and orchestration platform for agent workflows

name: Magnitude
long_description:
Knowledge workers spend 85% of their day in the browser.

Yet so much of this work is¬†tedious, time-consuming labor.

AI has revolutionized browser automation - but it's trapped behind APIs, SDKs, and complex interfaces. Tools like UIPath and Zapier tried to help, but they're still too technical, expensive, or complicated.

What if automating your repetitive browser work was as easy as explaining it to a coworker?

That‚Äôs Magnitude. Simply record yourself taking actions on your browser, talk through the details, and our AI builds your automation. Run it instantly or schedule it - no maintenance required.
one_liner: Automate any browser workflow with a narrated screen recording

name: Stockline
long_description:
Stockline is reshaping ERPs to bring innovation to a $990B+ industry left behind by the tech revolution: the food supply chain.

Food wholesalers still rely on software from the 90s. One symptom among many: they waste hours retyping orders and invoices that arrive through scattered channels like WhatsApp, SMS, and email into their ERPs. Manual admin work takes over. Headcount grows just to handle repetitive tasks.
This leads to mistakes, tight margins, and food waste.

Stockline replaces outdated ERPs with AI at its core. The game-changer? No more manual data entry. Our AI pulls orders from every channel and feeds them directly into one unified system.

Admin disappears. Wholesalers get to focus on what really matters: their products and their customers.
one_liner: AI-native ERP for food wholesalers

name: Kestroll
long_description:
Kestroll is the AI-powered media asset management platform.

Kestroll automatically ingests, labels, and organizes all of your company's media assets (photos, audio, and especially videos) and provides a central interface for the entire organization to access and distribute content.

Kestroll eliminates the laborious labeling process and provides easy content access for the entire organization, without the clunky interfaces and long learning curves of traditional MAMs.

The days of filtering through someone else's tags are past. With Kestroll, anyone in the organization can search in everyday language, based on visual cues, abstract concepts, creative intent, and more, without the burden of manual labeling.
one_liner: AI media asset management

name: Pangolin
long_description: Pangolin provides a simple way to securely expose applications on private networks with identity-aware access control and high availability. It‚Äôs an open-source cloud and self-hosted solution that enables administrators to maintain data sovereignty and control user interaction to internal tools.
one_liner: Open-source secure gateway to private networks

name: CareSwift
long_description: Ambulance crews lose valuable time completing reports after each call. Even minor mistakes cause insurance claims to be rejected. CareSwift is a real-time AI assistant built directly into ambulance reporting systems, guiding medics as they document care and instantly flagging errors. Crews complete accurate, compliant reports in under three minutes, cutting documentation time by 80 percent and helping agencies avoid insurance claim denials.
one_liner: AI operating system for ambulance agencies

name: Dash
long_description:
Dash is a general agent that connects to your G-Suite, Slack, Notion, Linear, and more to take in your personal context and perform actions. 

Consider it an agentic Glean that allows knowledge workers to save 2-3 hours a day of busy work.
one_liner: ChatGPT with Hands

name: AgentHub
long_description:
AgentHub helps you catch and fix errors in your AI agents - before your users ever see them.

Our RL simulation engine lets you test, trace, and evaluate agentic workflows using curated and synthetic test cases. Generate large annotated datasets and experiment with different prompts, models, and configurations - all in one place - with clear visualizations of what‚Äôs working (and what‚Äôs not).

Built by a former tech lead from Apple‚Äôs Foundation Model Eval team and a product engineer from MIT with experience working on agents at startups, AgentHub makes it easy to integrate your use case and start improving your agents quickly.

Our streamlined onboarding process lets you get your agent eval environment up and running fast‚Äîno heavy lifting on your end.

Close the feedback loop and build better agents, faster - with confidence.
one_liner: The simulation and evaluation engine for AI agents

name: BootLoop
long_description: BootLoop is building the first AI agent to write and test firmware on real hardware. Existing AI coding assistants fail completely with embedded systems, but our agent ingests datasheets, schematics, and other design files to write firmware in your style and automatically test it on your hardware.
one_liner: Firmware in minutes, not months - rigorously tested on real hardware

name: Parachute
long_description: Parachute is the AI Quality Assurance Lab for hospitals ‚Äî end-to-end governance that lets clinical AI move from inception to implementation with confidence. We pre-vet vendors, enforce compliance, track every model in real time, and preserve an immutable audit log that stands up to regulators and litigators, enabling safe, scalable AI in healthcare.
one_liner: Quality Assurance & Governance Infrastructure for Clinical AI

name: b-12
long_description:
At B-12, we are developing AI agents for automated workflows in chemistry and pharma R&D, as a way of manifesting chemical super intelligence (CSI) in the physical world. We are preparing for the next wave of physical AI, specializing in chemistry.

Our long-term goal is to create autonomous labs that can plan and perform complex, multistep syntheses with minimal human intervention.
one_liner: Developing chemical super intelligence - one agent at a time.‚Ä¶

name: Flai
long_description:
The problem we solve: 56% of dealership leads arrive after business hours, and most dealers lose these potential customers to competitors who happen to be available 24/7. Missing after-hours calls alone costs the average dealership $1M annually in lost revenue.

We built Flai to fix this - AI assistants that answer dealership calls 24/7, scheduling test drives, oil changes, or running outbound recall campaigns so no opportunity slips away.

The result: No more missed opportunities, no more losing customers to competitors.

Our founding team has built voice AI products at HappyRobot, scaled infrastructure at Uber for millions of users, and applied data science at Netflix to solve operational challenges.

We're not just answering phones, we're helping dealerships win in an AI-first world where availability determine who gets the sale.
one_liner: We Bring Customers to Your Dealership

name: Embedder
long_description: Embedder is building developer tools for embedded software.
one_liner: Cursor for Embedded

name: Wisp AI
long_description: Wisp AI is the executive assistant for everyone ‚Äî not just CEOs. It manages your calendar, drafts emails, summarizes meetings and notes, and handles your to-dos and reminders. Built for small business owners and busy employees, Wisp saves hours every week by automating admin work ‚Äî all for a fraction of the cost of a human assistant.
one_liner: Wisp AI is an executive assistant for the everyday user.

name: Channel3
long_description:
Channel3 is building a database of every product on the internet.

Google and OpenAI maintain vast product graphs, but keep that valuable data to themselves. Channel3 gives every developer access, opening a world of possibility for new shopping experiences across any vertical. For instance, developers could build AI fashion stylists or give their agents shopping capabilities.

We don‚Äôt just collect product data; we actually understand it. With the latest image classification and reasoning models, we can match products across merchants‚Äîeven when listings and images differ‚Äîrecognize variants, and surface the perfect matches for every search. As we grow, we‚Äôll capture unique insights into what users want, click, and buy.

As AI models get smarter and cheaper, our flywheel accelerates: our catalog will improve, and it will be even easier for developers and vibe-coders to build on our infrastructure. To further incentivize building on Channel3, we provide built-in monetization; developers earn commissions on sales they drive.

Alex discovered this need while building an AI tutor that could recommend products and earn affiliate revenue. When no solution existed, he persuaded his smartest friend from Duke and former co-founder George to leave Palantir and build Channel3 together.
one_liner: Database of every product on the internet

name: GhostEye
long_description:
GhostEye offers offensive AI agents that generate sophisticated social engineering campaigns across a multitude of attack vectors.

Leveraging natural language prompts, GhostEye creates personalized campaigns in seconds, in what used to take hours.
one_liner: The AI-powered human pentesting platform

name: Comena
long_description: We build AI agents that automate order processing for industrial distributors and manufacturers. Say goodbye to inside sales teams spending hours on manual data entry. Comena streamlines order and quote entry, from inbox to ERP, freeing up sales teams to focus on high-value activities and proactive selling.
one_liner: AI agents for distributors and manufacturers to automate order entry.

name: VibeFlow
long_description: VibeFlow generates full-stack web apps from prompts with n8n-style visual workflows for the backend. Users of tools like Lovable or v0 can easily iterate over frontends because they can see them, while backends remain closed black boxes that are hard to evolve through prompting. VibeFlow opens up backend logic, making it visual and editable, with powerful integrations built in.
one_liner: Prompt to full stack app with visual workflows

name: Nozomio
long_description:
Nozomio is a product lab building engineers for the age of AI.

As coding agents become ubiquitous, the real bottleneck shifts from ‚Äúwrite code‚Äù to ‚Äúknow which code and docs to feed them.‚Äù Starting with the tool named Nia, the mission is to provide context enrichment through agentic research and indexing of any external codebase(-s) or documentation via MCP / API.

Nozomio started with Arlan's early frustration with the agentic coding ecosystem, especially around context and memory. After winning Product of the Day in February and raising pre-seed, Arlan moved to London and then to SF as a solo immigrant from Kazakhstan to build the future of software engineering. 

try nia at trynia .ai <3
one_liner: Engineers for AI era, starting with contextual layer for coding agents

name: Mimos
long_description:
Mimos is an Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) platform designed for regulated experts, starting with Registered Investment Advisors (RIAs). 

We help highly-regulated companies get discovered and trusted on AI platforms like ChatGPT and Gemini, driving qualified inbound while staying compliant.

===

Rohit & Mike have been working together on various technical project since middle school (13 years!) - and Mimos came about as one of those projects.
one_liner: Helping regulated firms show up in AI search.

name: Mohi
long_description:
We help people understand their agent workflows and where they went wrong.

We met early on at MIT and built a bunch of projects together for fun. Of course when the AI wave took over, we were excited about agents. We made our own agents, and we always found it annoying figuring out if they consistently worked or not.

We believe that it should be easy to know what your agents are doing and why, no matter the use case or the tech stack. So that's exactly what we're helping companies achieve; we started building a few weeks ago and are working with our design partner to get deep observability and insights into their agent executions.

The future is autonomous; AI agents will be everywhere. Mohi can make sure that we humans know what these agents are doing.
one_liner: Analyze and understand complex agent workflows with clarity.

name: Riff
long_description:
Riff is a super powered music editor where experienced producers can be dramatically more productive and hobbyists can delight in music without needing technical chops.

As we continue to build, we see Riff turning into an entirely new paradigm for creating music.
one_liner: Cursor for music production

name: Summon
long_description:
Summon is the complete end-to-end MCP platform. We're building the pipes connecting context to client applications for the agent economy. 

Summon transforms MCP development from a fragmented, manual process into an AI-first, collaborative workflow. We build MCP servers from OpenAPI specs using our AI agent, provide debugging playgrounds, run continuous evaluations against different LLMs, and offer enterprise hosting with observability. This creates a complete virtuous loop where AI builds, maintains, and improves MCP integrations, accelerating time-to-market, reducing bugs, and aligning developers, QA, and product teams.

With MCP gaining adoption across ChatGPT, Claude, and Microsoft Copilot, companies need agent-accessible APIs to remain competitive.
one_liner: Open-Source Postman for MCP servers

name: Phases
long_description: We‚Äôre building the first full-stack AI agent company to automate clinical trials for pharma companies.
one_liner: Automating clinical trials with agents, starting in recruitment

name: Perseus Defense
long_description:
Perseus Defense is building a mass-manufactured Counter UAS solution for the Department of Defense and Department of Homeland Security. Current solutions are one-to-one, too dangerous for use on U.S. soil, and orders of magntiude more expensive than the threats they defeat. Our micro-guided missile system is man-portable, multi-domain capable, and has both forward-deployed and low-collateral defeat variants. It senses, engages, and eliminates threats with drastically reduced cost per engagement. 

Solving this critical national security problem requires understanding complex DoD needs along with actual rocket science including aerodynamics, guidance, navigation, control, and much more. Jason and Steve met at Penn State while they pursued a PhD and MS in aerospace engineering, respectively. Their past experiences designing space helicopters for NASA, making Boeing airliners land autonomously, controlling swarms of unmanned autonomous systems, teaching aerospace engineering at Stanford, winning multiple ONR and DOE engineering competitions, and founding an international drone competition makes them the perfect team to create transformative solutions protecting our service members. 

"If you build this, it will be mandatory equipment for every truck, boat, and convoy in the U.S. Military. We're talking thousands of units." - Former DoD Procurement Officer

The White House just released Executive Order, "Unleashing American Drone Dominance" which adds billions of dollars, government support, and streamlined regulations to enable the development of our product. 

Traction: 
A UAS prototype was designed and built in one week and a prototype of the guided missile was prototyped in four days. Following the Stanford Hacking for Defense process that Perseus Defense adviser and former Army Ranger Dr. Jeff Decker wrote the book on, Jason and Steve used 60 end-user interviews across the DoD and DHS to shape the product to something of critical need to both boots on the ground and DoD purchasers. Perseus has already been invited to a Phase-II in-person pitch of their solution to government end-users, signaling progress towards contract opportunities.
one_liner: Guided micro-missiles for Counter-UAS.

name: Novaflow
long_description:
Novaflow is an AI data analyst for biology labs. 
--
Bioinformatics data analysis is a time-consuming and expensive process for scientists. With Novaflow, life scientists can upload experimental data, ask questions in plain English, and get instant, publication-ready plots, giving them results in minutes instead of months.
one_liner: Automating data analysis for life science researchers

name: mcp-use
long_description:
mcp-use provides open-source dev tools and infrastructure for MCP to help dev teams quickly build and deploy custom AI agents with MCP servers. 
Our library has over 100,000 downloads and 4,000 stars, and is used by hundreds of engineers at big enterprises.
We provide a hosted and self-hosted platform that manages auth, access control, and multi-user environments for secure MCP agents deployment at scale.
one_liner: Open-source dev tools and infrastructure for MCP.

name: Motives
long_description: Motives is a team of AI agents that runs qualitative research projects for consumer brands: moderating and analyzing video interviews to help brands understand consumer preferences and test new ideas, in hours instead of weeks.
one_liner: Qualitative consumer research run by AI

name: Finto
long_description: Finto automates accounting for enterprises. With agents, we double an accountant's productivity in handling accounts payable - from invoice verification and supplier communication to account assignment, approval workflows, and ERP postings, all in one streamlined step.
one_liner: AI accounting for enterprises

name: April
long_description: April is a voice powered AI assistant that manages your email and calendar hands-free - helping you reach inbox zero and stay on top of your schedule without looking at a screen.
one_liner: Voice AI Executive Assistant

name: Autosana
long_description:
A cloud-based tool for mobile teams to run natural language end-to-end tests. Eradicates the need to write/maintain E2E tests and manual testing. Seamlessly integrates into your CI, supports both iOS and Android, and is framework-agnostic (React Native, Flutter, Swift, etc).

No code, no setup, just catching bugs before users do.
one_liner: QA agent for mobile apps

name: Socratix AI
long_description:
Socratix builds AI coworkers for fraud and risk teams so that humans don't have to spend their days drowning in alerts and spreadsheets.

Today, fraud and risk teams at fintechs and banks are overwhelmed. Analysts jump between tools, manually stitch together context, and make judgment calls under pressure, often for hundreds of alerts a week. Too much of their work is slow, repetitive, and error-prone. We're here to change that. 

Socratix gives fraud and risk teams AI coworkers that investigate alerts in real time, replacing manual reviews with fast, explainable decisions. Socratix agents plug into existing workflows and reason across signals just like human analysts to help teams reduce fraud losses, minimize false positives, and scale operations without scaling headcount.

We've seen this problem firsthand. At DoorDash, Riya helped save $30M+ a year by building smarter fraud detection and investigation tooling, and at Unit21, she built products for analysts that made them 3X faster. We're able to build and sell enterprise-grade software. At Cruise, Satya built scalable AI systems powering petabyte-scale data, and at LinkedIn, he built enterprise products from 0 to 1 generating $50M+ in incremental revenue. Now, the two of us are teaming up to eliminate the manual toil in fraud and risk.

We're obsessed with fraud, LLMs, real-world automation, and the messy edge cases traditional ML has trouble handling. We believe that every fraud analyst should have an AI coworker - and the future of fraud will involve combining human-level reasoning with machine-speed execution.
one_liner: AI coworkers for fraud and risk teams.

name: Observee
long_description:
All AI Agents rely on external integrations to become truly useful. Our software provides any AI Agent developer with access to over 1,000 MCP integrations through a single API. 

In the last 6 months, MCP has become the official protocol for connecting AI agents to the outside world. Observee provides developers with Authentication, Observability and Security in one hosted MCP. 

As AI Agents increasingly take on more manual jobs, they will rely on Observee for underlying infrastructure.
one_liner: Access 1000+ MCP integrations with a single API

name: Idler
one_liner: AI employees that handle the work, so people can do the magic.

name: Humoniq
long_description:
Humoniq is building voice AI agents to handle customer support for travel companies, such as airlines.

Our team is uniquely equipped to solve this challenge. We grew a travel management company, Flightfox (YC S12), to over $20M in annual sales while handling thousands of customer support requests.

Our mission now is to make customer support in travel the fastest and most helpful of any industry. We already have major travel companies signed and a rapidly growing deal pipeline.
one_liner: Voice AI agents for customer support in travel

name: PARES AI
long_description:
PARES is the single platform commercial real estate brokers need for their entire workflow, from chasing leads to closing deals and everything in between. 

With our platform, brokers can:

1) Automatically update real-time transaction data in our CRM

2) Create lists of target properties, skip-trace, and easily navigate outbound calls

3) Underwrite deals with our AI Underwriting Agent

4) Create OMs/BOVs in minutes with our AI Marketing Agent

Check us out at https://www.pares.ai/
one_liner: Helping commercial real estate brokers find and close more deals.

name: Altur
one_liner: AI agents for debt collection and sales

name: F4
long_description:
Built by former Tesla & SpaceX engineers, F4 is a platform that helps you catch and fix drawing compliance issues instantly. F4 ensures design engineers never release noncompliant drawings‚Äîand suppliers never misinterpret them. We help hardware teams eliminate costly scrap, rework, and miscommunication at the root.

With a compliant drawing, F4 generates end-to-end drawing interpretations for standard definitions, inspection plan, and tolerance analysis application.

F4 automatically interprets all GD&T symbols, datums, and notes based on the correct standards - no more second-guessing or misreading intent. Everyone from design to manufacturing sees the same definition, keeping teams aligned and avoiding costly miscommunication.

F4 generates a complete inspection plan straight from the drawing, so quality teams know exactly what to measure, how, and where. This eliminates manual setup, reduces delays during first article inspection, and helps catch issues before they reach production.

F4 gives engineers everything they need from the drawing to set up a reliable tolerance analysis, including the critical stack-up paths,  applicable features, and rule exceptions. By making it easy to bridge engineering drawings to tolerance analysis, teams can catch potential fit or function issues early - before parts are fabricated and assembled.
one_liner: Automating compliance checks for engineering drawings

name: Sira
long_description:
Sira is the AI-powered platform for managing time tracking, scheduling, payroll, and HR ‚Äî purpose-built for hourly teams.

Our intelligent agents handle the manual, time-consuming tasks for you ‚Äî like calling workers to fill open shifts, detecting timesheet anomalies, and streamlining payroll processing.

With Sira, businesses stay organized, compliant, and focused on what really matters ‚Äî while we take care of the team.
one_liner: AI HR manager for hourly teams

name: Opennote
long_description:
Opennote is building an interactive AI tutor that gives every student a truly personalized learning experience.

Most students never get to engage deeply with material in traditional classrooms or generic online tools. Opennote changes that by acting as a human-like, intuitive tutor‚Äîone that remembers your progress and adapts every session to how you learn best.
one_liner: The Interactive AI Tutor That Knows You

name: SigmanticAI
former_names: BitForge (in process of incorporating as SigmanticAI Inc due to trademark)
long_description:
SigmanticAI is building an AI-native hardware development assistant that automates the entire RTL design flow, from natural language to synthesizable HDL and testbenches, inside a seamless VSCode fork. Powered by fine-tuned Verilog LLMs, reinforcement learning, and real compiler feedback, SigmanticAI iteratively refines code until it compiles and passes synthesis, no matter how complex the design. It‚Äôs like the Cursor for HDL design. 

In addition to code generation, SigmanticAI can generate token-level annotations and onboarding documents to accelerate ramp-up for new engineers. With support for both cloud and on-prem deployment, it integrates with existing EDA tools to dramatically reduce debug time, improve collaboration, and accelerate hardware design across teams
one_liner: Suite of AI Agents and Tools to Accelerate HDL Design

name: Convexia
long_description:
An AI-maximalist pharma platform. We use agents to buy drugs, run clinical trials, and sell for a profit. 10x faster and 20x leaner than incumbents.

Sourcing Agent: Mines public/private databases and unstructured global data to surface overlooked preclinical candidates.
Scientific Agent: Runs comp bio models (ESM-3, RFdiffusion, MACE-MP-0) to assess safety and efficacy in silica.
Commercial Agent: Analyzes FDA incentives, pricing dynamics, TAM, competitive landscape, and payer alignment.
Clinical Agent: Runs digital twin simulations, evaluates CRO/CMC risk, and builds trial plans to Phase 1.
BD Agent: Summarizes and delivers company-tailored pitches. 

Built by 2 Stanford CS students who have built 3 startups together before.
one_liner: The world's first AI-maximalist pharma company

name: Pally
long_description:
Hey üëã,¬†we‚Äôre Haz and Wyatt, the founders of Pally, and we‚Äôre building at the intersection of AI and Human Relationships. 

We believe that while AI will automate a lot of low-level tasks, that this will dramatically increase the value of human connection at the highest level.

In a world full of ‚ÄòAI SDRs‚Äô, our warm connections become more important than ever. 

Yet today, keeping track of thousands of connections across countless social platforms is impossible. We forget to respond, we miss important moments, we lose touch.  

We‚Äôre building Pally to solve that. 

We bring together every connection, across every platform. Our AI researches everything they‚Äôve ever posted online, and uses its deep understanding of each person to help you achieve your goals; whether hiring, fundraising, or sales.
one_liner: Pally is an AI Relationship Management Platform

name: Nottelabs
long_description: Nottelabs designs browsers using agents for enterprise. Focused on reliability and scalability, we convert websites into structured text APIs to power LLM-driven web scraping and workflow automation, with full support for stealth, vaults, and enterprise tooling.
one_liner: Building infrastructure for reliable web agents

name: Hera
long_description:
Hera is an AI motion designer that turns 5-hour projects into 5-minute tasks. 

When you're a YouTuber making an infographic animation, instead of spending hours manually clicking buttons in Adobe After Effects, you can create the same animation in minutes in Hera. 

Through talking to our users, we realized that 95% of time spent on motion graphics is manual button clicking, not creative work. This insight led us to focus on automating the tedious parts while giving the user all creative control.

We launched in May 2025, got 100k waitlist signups in 8 weeks, and we're doubling revenue monthly.
one_liner: AI Motion Designer

name: Certus AI
long_description:
Certus AI is replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI.

Restaurants lose up to $100,000 per year per location from missed calls, lost orders, and abandoned hold lines. Staff are overwhelmed. IVRs frustrate customers. Call centers are expensive and impersonal.

It‚Äôs 2025. Guests don‚Äôt leave voicemails or wait on hold. They just move on.

Certus is an AI voice agent built for restaurants. It answers every call, 24/7 ‚Äî taking orders, processing deliveries, booking reservations, upselling, and handling complaints in English, Spanish, French and more. Certus is built to manage the phone line end to end, from the customer call to the restaurant tech stack, with zero human intervention required. It currently integrates with industry-leading systems like Toast, Square, Clover, UberEats, DoorDash, and more.

We‚Äôre building the voice layer of the modern restaurant ‚Äî the employee they‚Äôll never fire.

We started Certus because we lived the pain. Gurveer (CEO) grew up answering phones in his family‚Äôs restaurant and helped operate them, growing from 1 to 11 locations in 7 years. Later, he and Adam (CRO) ran a restaurant growth startup to help others increase revenue, but kept watching clients bleed cash because no one picked up the phone. So we built the solution the industry always wished existed.

Until now, this problem was considered unsolvable. But Voice AI has finally crossed the conversational chasm and 72% of consumers now prefer AI over humans as long as it means faster and better service.

More importantly, the market is begging for this. The North American restaurant industry crossed $1 trillion in 2024, and it's projected to hit $1.5 trillion in 2025. Yet over $100 billion is still lost annually to missed calls, human error, and outdated tech. As the market continues to grow, so do the losses!

Our customers say it best:

- ‚ÄúCertus changed my life overnight.‚Äù
- ‚ÄúWe were losing the ability to give great in-house service ‚Äî the phone was killing us.‚Äù
-  ‚Äú70% of my business comes through the phone. That‚Äôs mine and my 16 staffs livelihood.‚Äù
- ‚ÄúBefore Certus, I used to lose 40 - 60 calls a day‚Ä¶. now my printer just stays printing!‚Äù
-  ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been in the business 38 years. I‚Äôve been waiting for this since then.‚Äù

Certus is here to fix the $120B phone problem ‚Äî one call at a time.

And in doing so, we‚Äôre redefining how the restaurant industry communicates forever, starting with the phone line.
one_liner: Replacing the restaurant phone line with Voice AI

name: Reacher
long_description:
Reacher automates affiliate marketing for enterprise brands, replacing teams of 5+ people with AI-powered creator discovery, outreach, and management. 

Trusted by brands driving $20M+ in GMV, we're building the largest marketplace where creators access premium deals guided by an AI talent manager, while brands access our vetted network of top creators.
one_liner: We help brands scale creator partnerships 10x faster

name: Kernel
long_description:
Kernel is the best place in the world to launch web agents and browser automations. We handle the hard parts of running browser infrastructure in the cloud so you don‚Äôt have to: spinning up browsers quickly, responsive read/write live view, logs, headless vs. headful mode, replays, residential proxies, and more. Our API allows developers to instantly launch browsers in the cloud, so you can focus on your core product logic rather than the infra underneath.

Our customers use Kernel to launch QA agents, vertical-specific agents that automate back office processes, and more.

We're open source, HIPAA-compliant (SOC2 Type 2 pending), & compatible with every browser/web agent framework (Playwright, Puppeteer, CUA, Browser Use, Magnitude, etc). Check us out ‚Äî> https://github.com/onkernel/kernel-images
one_liner: High performance browsers-as-a-service for web agents & automations

name: dScribe AI
long_description:
dScribe AI uses autonomous drones and 3D vision to track bulk inventory. We're starting by helping the ag and mining industry track stockpiles of grain and gravel.

Bulk inventory tracking is broken. Companies either rely on guesstimates or pay for expensive manual surveys which are still off by 20 to 30%. Without accurate numbers, it‚Äôs hard to plan logistics, like how many truckloads are needed. And it creates accounting issues by misreporting inventory value, hurting financial planning and leading to missed opportunities.

We‚Äôve lived this problem, and we know how to solve it. Warren saw it firsthand as a Product Manager at Milk Moovement, a $20M Series A AgTech startup, working closely with feed suppliers and farm managers. Jordan scaled Microsoft Azure‚Äôs largest public API, handling over 700M requests/month, and sold software to a public company. Cole was engineer #3 at Tropic, scaling it from seed to Series B, and later led engineering at an AI startup.

We‚Äôve built an integrated hardware and software platform that‚Äôs now being piloted by some of the largest agriculture and construction companies in North America. As industries demand real-time visibility into the physical world, dScribe AI is positioned to become the system of record for inventory that don‚Äôt fit in traditional boxes and barcodes.
one_liner: Track bulk inventory with autonomous drones and 3D vision

name: Okibi
long_description:
Whether you're building an¬†internal workflow automation to remove repetitive or time consuming tasks, or launching your own product with Agents,¬†Okibi can help you build it.

Building AI agents typically requires¬†complex,¬†time-consuming¬†setup, including¬†tool calling,¬†LLM syntax management,¬†multi-agent orchestration,¬†browser use,¬†evals, and¬†hosting deployments.

Our web app provides a¬†chat interface¬†and toolkit to easily create agents.¬†Just describe your agent in natural language, similar to vibecoding, and our app automatically generates your agent's architecture, tool calls, human in the loop, browser user, and runs evals on your agent.

This approach¬†significantly reduces development complexity and time.
one_liner: Build agents using natural language, it's Lovable for agents

name: Juxta
long_description:
Juxta is creating the first Universal Positioning System (UPS) ‚Äî a GPS alternative that can monitor movement anywhere on earth with no new hardware, minimal internet connection, and remote deployment. Using custom machine learning models and a first-of-its-kind synthetic fingerprinting technology, Juxta can make any indoor, outdoor, or underground space location-aware in minutes for a fraction of the cost of any other geospatial technology.

Juxta's UPS can be leveraged across industries ‚Äî from securely tracking soldiers in combat zones to providing offline positioning for robots to offering asset tracking in warehouses and ports around the globe.
one_liner: Building a GPS alternative 100x more powerful with no hardware needed.

name: Flywheel AI
long_description: Flywheel AI converts any existing excavators for contractors to enable remote ops to increase safety and productivity, and use robotics context dataset to train autonomous policies.
one_liner: Waymo for excavators

name: stagewise
long_description:
stagewise is the first frontend coding agent for existing production-grade web apps. It lives right inside your browser, makes changes in your local codebase and is compatible with all kinds of frameworks and setups - allowing it to be retrofitted into any existing project. Our agent enables you to show and tell what you want to change - all while using your app on localhost and without having to switch to external tools. Making changes is as easy as selecting elements, giving a simple prompt like ‚Äúmake it green and put it in the top right corner‚Äù, and immediately seeing the result.

We are two German engineers who met while working at a B2B SaaS startup. With backgrounds in both enterprise engineering (Rheinmetall, dSPACE) and building web apps used by thousands, we have the unique blend of discipline and product sense needed to build this.

After making our initial launch with the open-sourced toolbar that puts your favorite coding agent right inside your browser and going viral with it, we‚Äôre now launching a high-speed coding agent dedicated to frontend development - taking our product and the experience of our users to the next level.

Our vision is to empower anyone to create well-designed applications, regardless of their technical skill. We start with developers who lack design experience, but our ultimate goal is to change how products are built. stagewise will enable non-technical stakeholders - product managers, designers, and marketers - to directly iterate on the UI themselves, creating a new, collaborative workflow and making us the essential tool for building on the web.
one_liner: A frontend coding agent that lives inside your browser on localhost.

name: Magnetic
long_description:
Magnetic scans client documents - from handwritten charity notes to excel spreadsheet Schedule Cs to multi-state K-1s - and enters them into tax software automatically, saving hours of tedious data entry. 

The accounting profession is facing a massive talent shortage, as graduates choose different professions and the old guard begins to retire. As a result, CPA and tax preparation firms are awash in clientele, but unable to keep up. At many firms, phones go unanswered, clients are "fired", and websites are taken down, as the existing workforce tries to handle the grueling 80 hour+ weeks necessary to push through tax season to the April 15th deadline.

We built this because a former colleague who owns her own tax firm asked us to automate her workload, and we quickly realized the massive opportunity. Thomas brings deep domain expertise as the former Head of Product at Keeper (YC W19), where he built tax engine automation systems and an OCR form scanning system that outperformed everything else on the market. At Keeper, he leveraged early access to OpenAI's LLMs (well before ChatGPT) to build systems that automated the entire tax filing process, allowing a tiny team of CPAs to process thousands of returns with near zero busy work. Patrick was the first engineer at FunCraft, shipping multiple mobile games with 1M+ downloads and building scalable shared codebases. We've worked together since 2017, including co-leading multiple teams at Zynga as PM & Tech Lead respectively.

We launched this year in the middle of tax season and quickly processed hundreds of returns, earning thousands in ARR, and since tax season we've been growing customers by >30% month-over-month. We've completely automated over 25% of the return process so far and developed a proprietary vision model that beats incumbent scanning technology by almost 2x on accuracy - jumping from 50% field-level accuracy to 89%, approaching the quality of their expensive human-verified service at 92%.

The opportunity is massive - there are 80M US personal tax returns filed via professionals annually, in a $2B outsourcing market where individual CPA firms currently pay $100k-$1M per year for inferior services. We're positioned to capture significant market share by offering better accuracy & document coverage, instant processing, and superior user experience.

We've built this kind of software before, we've worked together for years (and even lived together), we've built products to $10M ARR before, and we have the grit to outwork anyone in this space.
one_liner: AI tax preparation for CPAs

name: Modelence
long_description:
You built the demo in a weekend. Now you need auth, a prod-grade database, real-time events, AI observability, cron jobs, email, monitoring‚Ä¶ and you needed them yesterday.

We spent a decade at our previous startup, building a platform while scaling to millions of users and customers like Meta & Netflix. Now we put that into an open-source framework, so others wouldn‚Äôt have to do the same from scratch.

Modelence is a batteries-included framework that abstracts away boilerplate so you can just focus on building your product logic and nothing else - it‚Äôs like Next.js + Vercel + Supabase on a single platform, built for full-stack TypeScript.

Shipping production apps is much harder than building a prototype that runs locally and 95% of all production apps share the same building blocks. We did a massive amount of work on our previous platforms that was not specific to our product, and we‚Äôve created Modelence to abstract that away:
- Authentication
- Database setup
- Hosting / CDN
- AI integration (LLM observability, prompts)
- Real-time events
- Cron jobs
- Email service
- Monitoring
- Analytics
- Admin dashboards

Andrej Karpathy recently posted about this same exact problem:
https://x.com/karpathy/status/1905051558783418370

and explained it further in his YC AI Startup School talk:
https://youtu.be/LCEmiRjPEtQ?feature=shared&t=1940
one_liner: All-in-one TypeScript platform for startups

name: Perspectives Health
one_liner: Automating EMRs for frontline clinicians

name: TectoAI
long_description: We help your company identify roles that can be filled by agentic AI tools, onboard them quickly, monitor their performance and behavior post deployement, ensure they remain compliant, and aligned with regulations. Tecto is building the HR system for managing your AI employees!
one_liner: Governance for AI Employees

name: Interfere
one_liner: The self-healing layer of the internet

name: Vulcan Technologies
long_description:
Vulcan primarily offers two different AI services for two different constituencies:
1) Automatic regulatory drafting for executive branch agencies in government and 
2) Regulatory compliance and comment for industry
Beneath these tools is a proprietary system that we call "intelligent legal cartography," an automatic mapping of relationships between statutes, regulations, and case law. In short: Vulcan equips agencies to comply with changing state and federal law, and enables business to comment, contest, and comply with regulatory requirements.
one_liner: AI legal cartography

name: Outrove
long_description: Outrove is the world‚Äôs most realistic AI recruiter, with a human-appearing interview agent that has both video and audio and can join Google Meet calls.
one_liner: Ultra-realistic AI Recruiter

name: Luminal
long_description:
Luminal builds an ML framework and compiler that generates GPU code.
Our stack 10x's model speed while simplifying deployment and cutting idle GPU costs

Github: https://github.com/jafioti/luminal
Discord: https://discord.gg/2Mxur3CgYT
one_liner: Simple ML framework and cloud for generating fast GPU code.

name: RealRoots
long_description: RealRoots is a mobile app that guarantees women lifelong friendships. After a quick 10-minute survey, we match each user with compatible friends nearby. From there, our AI assistant plans thoughtful, recurring hangs - so her social calendar stays full of meaningful connection.
one_liner: RealRoots is a mobile app that guarantees women lifelong friendships.

name: Uplift AI
long_description:
We build speech understanding and speech generation models for the five major languages spoken in Pakistan, where 42% of the adult population can not read any language. 

Pakistan is the 5th most populous country in the world with a $411 billion GDP. Yet its overlooked and no practical voice models exist for the local languages.

With our APIs and SDKs, businesses offer high-quality voice interfaces in domains like banking, agriculture, healthcare, and government services. This enables them to finally offer digital services to every customer -- often for the first time.

Our founding team has a decade of experience building world-leading voice products, including at Alexa and Siri. We have launched entire AWS services; and software written by us previously is used by millions daily.

We do in-house research and development. We gather our own data, then train and deploy our own models. We own our technology stack end-to-end.

We are on a mission to uplift entire nations through better access to digital information and digital services.
one_liner: Foundational Voice AI for underserved languages

name: Nox Metals
long_description: Nox Metals is building the fastest processing metals factory in North America. Our software runs quoting, scheduling, and operations to streamline production and reduce cost. We supply CNC shops with custom-cut material at unmatched speed and efficiency.
one_liner: The modern factory for fast, low-cost metals.
